definition[0]: the period of time between two events, activities etc
example[0]: He left the room, returning after a short interval with a message.
example[1]: The interval between arrest and trial can be up to six months.
definition[1]: a short period of time between the parts of a play, concert etc
example[2]: We can get some drinks in the interval.
definition[2]: the amount of difference in pitch between two musical notes
